Text: More trash from David Irvine, a notorious holocaust denier. He has been successfully pursued in court and shown to be a liar and a fabricator of facts. Historical authorities have denounced his fabrications from one end of the globe to the other. This film continues his quest to defend the poor Nazis who aren't to blame for WWII, at least according to Irvine. A despicable man if there ever was one!
This is a PBS video, not what you lied.
